data.event: Uganda gained independence in 1962, but this did not improve the situation for the people in the north.

event.title: were formed by the end of 1986

data.event: Several rebel groups were formed by the end of 1986.

event.title: 1987 most of these rebels had joined

data.event: By 1987 most of these rebels had joined Museveni's force.
The Lord's Resistance Army sprang up in the 1990s after Alice Lakwena left Uganda and went to Kenya.
